select-event.notes: Added performance utilities (useAfterPaint, useDeferredMount) for provider optimization

guest/home.notes: Significant improvement through provider scoping and deferred messaging

host/dashboard.notes: LeanHostProvider reduces bundle on non-messaging route

host/messages.notes: Messaging route includes MessagingProvider as expected

optimization_summary.provider_architecture: Realtime scoped to messaging routes only
optimization_summary.post_paint_loading: Heavy providers defer until after LCP
optimization_summary.execution_optimization: Reduced initial JavaScript blocking on critical paths
